description: This file defines a React component named LocationsManager that provides a form to add new locations, managing internal state and handling asynchronous API calls.

methods.name: LocationsManager
methods.description: React functional component that renders a form to add a new location and manages input state, API call, and error handling.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Asynchronous event handler for form submission; trims input, calls addLocation API, resets state, and handles errors.
